mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ono, rdate , rtime, price, totalprice, housecode, address1, address2, method, phone, request, state, mno) values (orders_seq.nextval ,sysdate , sysdate ,#{price } ,#{totalprice } ,#{housecode},#{address1},#{address2} ,#{method }, #{phone }, #{request }, #{state }, #{mno })
